é um jogo muito bom pra aquelas pessoas que procuram jogos de terror cooperativo, em si o jogo não é tão assustador, mas no jogo tem um sistema de perks( que são habilidades adquiridas na arvore de sangue tanto quanto survivor quanto pra killer)

Bom jogo :)

[h1] Dead by Daylight: ein Game - 2 unterschiedliche Spielerfahrungen![/h1]

Zum einen wäre da die gut durchdachte [b]Co-Op Survival Action[/b], in der man versucht, als Team einem von vielen verschiedenen Killern zu entkommen. Hierbei kann eine gute Absprache der Schlüssel zum Erfolg sein.

Wem das nicht zusagt, der kann sich als solo Killer versuchen, um die Überlebenden an der Fluch zu hindern. Die Killer haben dabei jeweils eine einzigartige Fähigkeiten, die sie besonders machen.

Es gibt allerdings einen Haken (damit meine ich nicht die im Spiel haha):
Die Community ist leider zu großen Teilen sehr toxisch, sowohl Killer als auch Überlebende. Wer da allerdings drüber hinweg sehen kann, der kann hier ohne Bedenken zugreifen.

Kleiner Tipp zum Abschluss: Spielt das Spiel mit Freunden. So machts am meisten Laune!

until you'll lose your mind.

(it's fun tho, sometimes and it's unfortunately [i]unique[/i])

El balance del juego entre ambos bandos nunca esta presente, depende el parche la situación mejora para algun lado, por lo general a los supervivientes, a pesar de esto es un buen juego y el mejor en su genero.

180 Stunden, würde Ich es empfehlen? Nein, nicht wenn ihr es noch nie gespielt habt. Es dauert eine Weile um zurecht zu kommen und alles zu verstehen. Am Anfang spielte Ich es aufgrund des Horrors, doch der vergeht nach einer Weile. Grade bin Ich an einem Punkt an dem Ich vermutlich nur noch spiele weil mich Freunde einladen oder um den Battle Pass zu leveln. Wenn Ihr es auf Konsole gespielt habt und mochtet, holts euch wenn Ihr wollt. Seid Ihr neue Spieler, bleibt besser davon weg. Das Spiel bring mehr Hass und Frust als Spaß.

Falls Ihr es euch trotzdem holt, es ist normal wenn Ihr Killer spielt und gewinnt beleidigt zu werden. Denn wir Killer sind einfach dreckige Hurensöhne die nur campen und tunneln. Im Ernst, ihr werdet mehr Hass als Spaß empfinden. Stellt gerne Fragen in den Kommentaren
в рот ebal игру за сурвов
เกมดีมีคุณภาพ

(I've played a lot more of this game on console). While I do recommend this game to any horror fan, this game is far from perfect. To start off with some of the good things with DBD, it is very unique, survivors must escape while an insanely powerful killer hunts them down one by one, it works very well, each survivor and killer are unique, with their own powers, and aesthetic, this game has really fun, tense, and stupid moments, and a lot of replay ability, it all comes together nicely. Now onto some gripes, the game has some balancing issues, some killers are just annoying to face off with, same with survivors, broken perks lead to toxic and annoying game play, also toxic strategies like hook camping ruin it for many people, a lot of the updates have sucked, most killers are OP when released, then instantly get nerfed, same with some survivors, and many characters just aren't viable to play as, and the dev's for this game have made several stupid changes that nobody asked for. While this game has many annoyances, I still love to come back to it from time to time and relive the tense and fun game play.

У каждой игры есть свои недостатки, и признаюсь за суммарно 800 часов я их нашёл немало.
Но эта игра в своём жанре уникальна и явно самая лучшая, советую попробовать.

Playing survivor is mostly ok and very fun when you're playing with friends except that when other survivors work with the killer and you report them, the devs dont do anything about it. Also, the devs intentionally screw over killers unless you're brand new. Playing killer is super fun when you are a beginner and they match you against survivors who are also beginners. But once you get halfway through the ranks, the devs start matching you with survivors who are much better than you and much higher rank than you. Some matches I'm matched with survivors 5-10 ranks above me. BUT you are not allowed to see survivors' ranks before the game starts to know that and leave. You get to find out the survivors' ranks AFTER they stomp you and you've already spent your points to use items for that match. I refuse to spend anymore real money on this game or suggest it to anyone else until they make matchmaking fair for killers and do something about survivors trolling their teammates and working with the killer when it is reported.
第一个非对称对抗游戏（虽然传言这个机制是窃取）但是一直这么多年了，还是很完善的，而且官方在国内有微博，会听取国内玩家意见。

Sinceramente tengo una relacíon amor-odio con este juego.Es muy buen juego en mi opinión y una gran viciada para el que le llegue a gustar por un lado. Puedes elegir entre jugar como superviviente y trabajar en equipo con otros 3 compañeros, o jugar como killer y pensar estrategias de como cazarlos y terminar por sacrificarlos en el gancho antes de que acaben los generadores y/o se vayan por la puerta o la trampilla. Cada killer tiene sus propias armas y poderes. Tanto supervivientes como killers tienen sus propias habilidaes que se pueden mejorar con puntos de sangre y, cuando ya tienes cierto nivel, puedes aplicar habilidades de un personaje concreto a otros; cosa que afectará luego la partida y en cómo quieres jugar. Pero
 ahora las cosas malas >:( : 
-Suele haber gente bastante tóxica en el chat del final de cada partida: siempre sacando el más mínimo defecto o error (que TODOS han cometido alguna vez) para echártelo en cara e insultar hasta a todo tu linaje sanguíneo. Simplemente gente con el ego muy subidito e inmadura.
-Últimamente se me crashean mucho las partidas y no puedo jugar hasta un rato. Hay un penalty por haberte desconectado en medio de la partida que consiste en no poder jugar en "x" tiempo. Y, si lo tienes varias veces siguidas en un mismo día, va aumentando el tiempo en que no puedes jugar. El máximo creo que son 2 días. Una locura, vaya.
-Muchos bugs aquí y hayá. Los desarrolladores no paran de arreglar el juego constantemente porque siempre aparecen otros bugs nuevos :( (aunque algunos hacen gracia a veces y hacen la partida más amena de alguna forma xD)
En resumen: un muy buen juego con ciertos errores que no le dejan ser todo lo bueno que podría llegar a ser realmente.
También puede ser que ciertos errores tengan que ver con mi PC, que es una patata y/o no lo suficente bueno para procesar correctmente ciertos juegos :'(

A 4v1 game sounds (on paper) thoroughly unbalanced, but this game makes it work (sort of). You play either as one of 4 survivors who can't outrun the killer or attack them, only perks that may help you to survive, or the killer who has to kill as many of the survivors as possible (preferably all of them). 
This game is good, but it does have some (read: a lot of) things that could improve. Some of the pros I have for this game are solely because I'm a huge fan of the horror genre. No matter the platform.

+ Nice selection of killers with a wide variety of special abilities. A lot of the various sub-genres are there. Body horror (The Hag), Torture horror (The Pig), Gore horror (Leatherface), and many more.
+ A lot of famous killers from famous horror films/games. If you're a fan of for example 80's slashers, give this game a shot.
+ No ranked system that truly matters, so with 3/4 friends you could have a lot of fun. Maybe by acting just as stupid as the victims in horror movies? 
+ Very atmospheric.
+ A few bugs make for hilarious gameplay. Like your character being in midair for the rest of the match because you were falling for 1 second.

- Not so much fun for the killer if you face a premade team with 4 friends. To win against a premade team (as a killer) takes a great deal of cunning. It's doable (and feels so good when it happens), but not so much fun when they teabag for instance.
- Lacks a couple of extra game modes. So far it's just "Survive" or "Kill". Would have been nice with the inclusion of, let's say, running through a timed labyrinth where 2 killers hunt you down.
- Albeit very atmospheric, it never really gets scary. Mostly it's because the killers are operated by real players and sometimes they like to troll. 
- Some bugs can ruin the match. For instance, the best perk in the game (for survivors), "Dead Hard" won't activate sometimes.

Conclusion - buy it for the lulz (when it's cheap), but don't expect a masterpiece. Would have been better with additional game modes. It's a fun game, but that's all. And sometimes....that's all you really need in a game
